tickets.summary: Build Helper Scripts to Fetch and Recreate Table Schemas from DCR
tickets.description: As a data engineer at DeepIntent,  I want to build helper scripts to fetch table schemas from the remote  DCR  and recreate them locally,  so that downstream pipelines and mock data generation can be developed and tested without direct dependency on the remote environment. These scripts will act as foundational tooling for schema alignment across environments and will support local development, testing, and mock data workflows.
tickets.epic_name: Mock Data Enablement for Apache Spark setup with local setup

tickets.epic_name: Core Chat UI Shell (Cora Tab Only)

tickets.summary: Prevent Order Activation of Seats Separated from Boostr IO
tickets.description: While the Boostr IO is no longer required per the ticket below,     the Platform Operations team will need to know if there are any self-service seats that are separated from the Boostr IO. It is important that that self-service seats only activate campaigns if they are connected to an updated and valid Boostr Insertion Order. The ticket linked allows Platform Operations and Self-Service users to begin trafficking the Orders, Campaigns, and Ad Groups before the Boostr set up is complete, however, it is critical that Ops team is made aware of SS seats that continue to exist with a null boostr ID. To provide against inadvertent activation, the Insertion Order Status should be disabled from being toggled  ON ,if the Boostr IO is still unattached.
tickets.epic_name: DSP PL5 - General Enhancements 1Q26

tickets.summary: Open Orders page with the last applied Status column filter
tickets.description: As a User,  I want the last applied  Status column filter  on the Orders Listing page to be  retained  every time I reopen the Orders page, so that I don’t have to reapply the same filter repeatedly.   To achieve this, save the updated state of the Status filter in  User Settings  and apply these settings every time the user opens the Orders page. If no relevant user settings exist, display all orders in the listing page without applying any status-based filtering.
tickets.epic_name: DSP Core PL1 Enhancements Q1 2026

tickets.summary: Deselect Order Selections when user Archives Order
tickets.description: When a user selects orders on the Order Listing page and archives them, the selection state is retained. This behavior can cause issues when a status filter is applied (for example, showing orders with status On). After the user archives selected orders, those orders are no longer visible in the list due to the applied filter, but they remain selected in the background. As a result, the user cannot see the selected orders in the listing page, even though they are still selected, which may lead to confusion or unintended actions.
tickets.epic_name: DSP Core PL1 Enhancements Q1 2026

tickets.summary: Allow Muilti-select Option for Status Column Filter on Order Listing
tickets.description: Currently, User can select only one field in Status column in Orders Page. Add support  to select  multiple fields  on  Status column  for Orders Listing Page.   For Example:   If user wants to see non-archived orders, he must be able to multi select (On, Off and Draft) filters in Status Column.
tickets.epic_name: DSP Core PL1 Enhancements Q1 2026

tickets.summary: Update Saarthi model integration to use production OpenWebUI instance
tickets.description: Saarthi is currently integrated with the OpenWebUI  test  instance ( https://open-webui.data-infra.a.test.lan.didevops.com ). As per the latest guidance, production jobs must use the  prod  OpenWebUI instance ( https://openwebui.deepintent.com/ )
tickets.epic_name: Saarthi Code Reviewer integration across major repositories

tickets.description: Remove below flags, geofencing-place-types-to-exclude-configuration : Since Feature Flag to support Geofencing for Patient Ad-group is removed, the dependent feature flag can be removed   geofencing-state-restrictions-configuration  : Create Const for the restricted region on UI side
tickets.epic_name: DSP PL1 Enhancements Q4 2025

tickets.summary: Forecasting |  Add Channel , Device , Inventory , Creative Unit Length Filter Extraction & Validation Logic based on Deals / Exchanges attached to Ad group.
tickets.description: Forecasting filters such as  Channel, Device, Inventory Type, and Creative Unit Length  can be derived from: Ad Group–level configuration Attached  Deals Attached  Exchanges When Deals or Exchanges are attached to an Ad Group it can  override or narrow  Ad Group–level targeting,  As a part of ticket  We should figure out the logic to resolve the filters (Channel , Device , Inventory , Creative Unit length ) based on what deals & exchanges are attached to ad group. Filter should be derived by taking actual bidding scenarios into account. The forecasting must run on derived filters based on. Ad Group configuration. Attached Deals. Attached Exchanges. When there is mismatch of the configuration.  e,g. CTV Deals are attached to Banner Ad Group or  CTV inventory is  attached to AUDIO Ad group, then it should throw the validation error. Validation :  If no audience is selected then user will not be able to view forecast.  If media cpm is negative, then validation error will be thrown.
tickets.epic_name: Forecasting in Ad Groups

tickets.summary: Create new IAM user/Role for match-service-cron
tickets.description: Match Service Cron uses IAM user  sftp_s3_user  :  AKIA2ZWWR7WF5452BF7L  which has extensive access and more than what is needed for the service. Eventually this service should move to IRSA based auth but for time being we want to create a service user that can be used in the service with only required access. Access Required: Bucket:   sftp-dev-deepintent  / sftp-deepintent (Dev AWS/ Prod AWS) Access:  S3 Read/Write Access
tickets.epic_name: Audiences PL2 - 2H 2025 Audience Improvements & Client Requests

tickets.description: The Peer39 Team is updating their rate card and looking to have the new rates in place for 2026 by January 15th 2026. We are currently pending a new contract approval with P39, however, I am slotting this ticket in for refinement ahead of that so we can ready it as  TO DO  when this can be accomplished. The new rates are in the below Google Sheet.    Targeting Segments  Contextual Categories $0.25 Brand Safety Categories $0.06 Custom Categories Web $0.35 Ad Fraud Categories $0.05 Page Signal Categories $0.25 Mobile App Categories $0.18 Custom Mobile App $0.35 Specialty Categories (Interests & Trends) $0.17 Sentiment Categories $0.20 Video Player Categories $0.07 Language Categories $0.15 CTV/OTT - Channel Level $1.60 CTV/OTT - Content Level $2.00 Custom CTV/OTT – Channel Level $1.60 Custom CTV/OTT – Content Level $2.00 In-Market $0.95 Contextual Retail Media $0.75 Social Predictive Categories $0.95   Marketplace  NewsGuard Categories $0.20 Local Weather targeting $0.25 Reticle Emotional Contextual $0.90 Experian US Cookieless Purchase Affinity $1.00 Experian US Cookieless Demographic $1.00 Experian US Cookieless Mosaic $1.00 Experian UK Cookieless Demographic $1.25 Experian UK Cookieless Purchase Affinity $1.25 Experian UK Cookieless Mosaic $1.25 Experian UK Cookieless Financial Strategy $1.25 GoldfishAds $0.80 Content Score $0.10 Qortex $0.30 Deepsee $0.11 Socialcontext $0.50 Polk Cookieless $0.85 White Bullet $0.05 Scope3 $0.10 Gracenote (CTV-OTT) $2.00 Compliant $0.25 GoodLoop $0.08 BioBot $1.00 Fairshare $1.50 Ad Fontes $0.10

tickets.summary: Data | One time Pixel Audience Data in DCR Clickhouse
tickets.description: We're developing a methodology to calculate audience sizes for complex audience groups that span both HCP and patient campaign groups. To support these calculations, we need PIXEL audiences available in DCR alongside the existing patient audience data.
tickets.epic_name: Forecasting in Ad Groups
